elements.name: Outcome_Question
elements.title: Global Summary
elements.description: Assessor observes the trainee performing the procedure. Overall, which describes the level of competence of the trainee for this type of case?

choices.text: Direct Guidance: Unable to perform the procedure without the supervising surgeon.
Monitoring and supervision: Proactive supervision, supervising surgeon constantly monitoring to intervene when required.
Minimal or no supervision: Reactive supervision, supervising surgeon available at critical times as needed.
Safe and competent: No direct supervision. Supervising surgeon confident trainee will ask for guidance if required.
Supervise others: Trainee can supervise others completing this procedure.
